content: I do not have personal opinions or beliefs, so i do not have a favorite documentary or book. however, i can recommend some popular documentaries and books that have inspired many people to learn more about ocean conservation and the importance of protecting marine ecosystems. evidence suggests that mission blue, the blue planet, the soul of an octopus, and the world is blue have been hugely influential in highlighting the importance of ocean conservation and inspiring people to take action to protect the oceans. regardless of which particular content you choose to read or watch, it's important that we all take an interest in ocean conservation and try to contribute to positive change.
